languages.text: "И все же..." {n}Ирлиэт касается камня душ, и лицо ее кривится в неподдельном отвращении.{/n} "Выходка одной из них переполнила чашу моего терпения. Она посмела приблизиться ко мне... заговорить... и, коснувшись руки, предложить уединиться, возжелав... возжелав... Кей-морагх! Одно воспоминание об этом вызывает бурю в моей душе!"

"And still..." {n}Yrliet touches her spirit stone and her face twists with genuine disgust.{/n} "One mon-keigh's stunt has caused the cup of my patience to spill over. She dared to approach me... to speak to me... and, touching my hand, she... she suggested that we withdraw somewhere private. She wanted... wanted... Kae-morag! The mere memory of it stirs up a tempest in my soul!"
languages.original_text: "И все же..." {n}Ирлиэт касается камня душ, и лицо ее кривится в неподдельном отвращении.{/n} "Выходка одной из них переполнила чашу моего терпения. Она посмела приблизиться ко мне... заговорить... и, коснувшись руки, предложить уединиться, возжелав... возжелав... Кей-морагх! Одно воспоминание об этом вызывает бурю в моей душе!"

traits.locale_text: "And still..." {n}Yrliet touches her spirit stone and her face twists with genuine disgust.{/n} "What overflowed my cup of patience was one of them playing a trick on me. She dared to approach me... talk to me... and, touching my hand, suggest to go someplace private, coveting... coveting... Kae-morag! The mere memory of it makes my soul burn red-hot!"

"And still..." {n}Yrliet touches her spirit stone and her face twists with genuine disgust.{/n} "What overflowed my cup of patience was one of them playing a trick on me. She dared to approach me... talk to me... and, touching my hand, suggest to go someplace private, coveting... coveting... Kae-morag! The mere memory of it makes my soul burn red-hot!"

She dared to approach me... to speak to me... and, touching my hand, she suggested that we withdraw somewhere private. She wanted... wanted... Kae-morag! The mere memory of it stirs up a tempest in my soul!"

"And still..." {n}Yrliet touches her spirit stone and her face twists with genuine disgust.{/n} "One mon-keigh's stunt has caused the cup of my patience to spill over. She dared to approach me... to speak to me... and, touching my hand, she suggested that we withdraw somewhere private. She wanted... wanted... Kae-morag! The mere memory of it stirs up a tempest in my soul!"

"And still..." {n}Yrliet touches her spirit stone and her face twists with genuine disgust.{/n} "One mon-keigh's stunt has caused the cup of my patience to spill over. She dared to approach me... to speak to me... and, touching my hand, she suggested that we withdraw somewhere private. She wanted... wanted... Kae-morag! The mere memory of it stirs up a tempest in my soul!"

languages.text: “可是……”{n}伊莉耶特摸了摸胸前的灵魂石，她的面容因为憎恶而扭曲。{/n}“可是，有个猴子实在太过分了，完全超出了我的忍耐限度。她竟敢走到我身边……和我说话……还摸着我的手，建议我们到更隐蔽的地方去。她想要……她想要……该死！光是想起这件事情，我的灵魂就震惊不已！”
languages.original_text: "And still..." {n}Yrliet touches her spirit stone and her face twists with genuine disgust.{/n} "One mon-keigh's stunt has caused the cup of my patience to spill over. She dared to approach me... to speak to me... and, touching my hand, she... she suggested that we withdraw somewhere private. She wanted... wanted... Kae-morag! The mere memory of it stirs up a tempest in my soul!"

traits.locale_text: “可是……”{n}伊莉耶特摸了摸胸前的灵魂石，她的面容因为憎恶而扭曲。{/n}“可是，有个猴子实在太过分了，完全超出了我的忍耐限度。她竟敢走到我身边……和我说话……还摸着我的手，建议我们到更隐蔽的地方去。她想要……她想要……该死！光是想起这件事情，我的灵魂就震惊不已！”

languages.text: «Aun así...». {n}Yrliet se toca la joya espiritual y su rostro se contrae en una mueca de genuino asco.{/n} «La insolencia de una mon-keigh ha vertido la gota que ha colmado el vaso de mi paciencia. Se atrevió a abordarme... a hablarme... me tocó la mano, y luego sugirió que nos fuésemos a algún lugar más privado. Quería... quería... ¡Kae-morag! ¡Solo con recordarlo estalla una tempestad en mi alma!».
languages.original_text: "And still..." {n}Yrliet touches her spirit stone and her face twists with genuine disgust.{/n} "One mon-keigh's stunt has caused the cup of my patience to spill over. She dared to approach me... to speak to me... and, touching my hand, she... she suggested that we withdraw somewhere private. She wanted... wanted... Kae-morag! The mere memory of it stirs up a tempest in my soul!"

traits.locale_text: «Aun así...». {n}Yrliet se toca la joya espiritual y su rostro se contrae en una mueca de genuino asco.{/n} «La insolencia de una mon-keigh ha vertido la gota que ha colmado el vaso de mi paciencia. Se atrevió a abordarme... a hablarme... me tocó la mano, y luego sugirió que nos fuésemos a algún lugar más privado. Quería... quería... ¡Kae-morag! ¡Solo con recordarlo estalla una tempestad en mi alma!».

languages.text: « Et pourtant... » {n}Yrliet caresse sa pierre-esprit tandis que son visage se déforme dans une grimace de dégoût.{/n} « Une mon-keigh est parvenue à épuiser ma patience. Elle a osé m'aborder... me parler... puis elle m'a touché la main et m'a proposé de m'emmener dans un lieu plus discret. Elle... Elle voulait... Kae-morag ! La simple évocation de ce souvenir fait naître une tempête dans mon âme ! »
languages.original_text: "And still..." {n}Yrliet touches her spirit stone and her face twists with genuine disgust.{/n} "One mon-keigh's stunt has caused the cup of my patience to spill over. She dared to approach me... to speak to me... and, touching my hand, she... she suggested that we withdraw somewhere private. She wanted... wanted... Kae-morag! The mere memory of it stirs up a tempest in my soul!"

traits.locale_text: « Et pourtant... » {n}Yrliet caresse sa pierre-esprit tandis que son visage se déforme dans une grimace de dégoût.{/n} « Une mon-keigh est parvenue à épuiser ma patience. Elle a osé m'aborder... me parler... puis elle m'a touché la main et m'a proposé de m'emmener dans un lieu plus discret. Elle... Elle voulait... Kae-morag ! La simple évocation de ce souvenir fait naître une tempête dans mon âme ! »

languages.text: "Und dennoch ..." {n}Yrliet berührt ihren Seelenstein, und in ihrem Gesicht zeigt sich echte Abscheu.{/n} "Eine Aktion einer Chem-Pan-Sey hat meinen Geduldsfaden nun doch reißen lassen. Sie wagte es, an mich heranzutreten ... sprach mich an ... berührte meine Hand und schlug vor, wir sollten uns an einen privaten Ort zurückziehen. Sie wollte ... wollte ... Kae-morag! Schon die Erinnerung lässt in meiner Seele einen Sturm entstehen!"
languages.original_text: "And still..." {n}Yrliet touches her spirit stone and her face twists with genuine disgust.{/n} "One mon-keigh's stunt has caused the cup of my patience to spill over. She dared to approach me... to speak to me... and, touching my hand, she... she suggested that we withdraw somewhere private. She wanted... wanted... Kae-morag! The mere memory of it stirs up a tempest in my soul!"

traits.locale_text: "Und dennoch ..." {n}Yrliet berührt ihren Seelenstein, und in ihrem Gesicht zeigt sich echte Abscheu.{/n} "Eine Aktion einer Chem-Pan-Sey hat meinen Geduldsfaden nun doch reißen lassen. Sie wagte es, an mich heranzutreten ... sprach mich an ... berührte meine Hand und schlug vor, wir sollten uns an einen privaten Ort zurückziehen. Sie wollte ... wollte ... Kae-morag! Schon die Erinnerung lässt in meiner Seele einen Sturm entstehen!"

languages.text: 「だが、それでも…」{n}ユリエットは魂縛石に触れ、本物の嫌悪感で顔をゆがめる。{/n}「あるモン＝ケイの煽りによって、我の忍耐の杯はこぼれ落ちた。彼女はあえて我に近づき、我に話しかけ、我の手に触れながら、どこか二人きりの場所に行こうと提案した。彼女は望んだのだ…カエ＝モラグ！そのことを思い出すだけで、我の魂は荒れ狂う！」
languages.original_text: "And still..." {n}Yrliet touches her spirit stone and her face twists with genuine disgust.{/n} "One mon-keigh's stunt has caused the cup of my patience to spill over. She dared to approach me... to speak to me... and, touching my hand, she... she suggested that we withdraw somewhere private. She wanted... wanted... Kae-morag! The mere memory of it stirs up a tempest in my soul!"

traits.locale_text: 「だが、それでも…」{n}ユリエットは魂縛石に触れ、本物の嫌悪感で顔をゆがめる。{/n}「あるモン＝ケイの煽りによって、我の忍耐の杯はこぼれ落ちた。彼女はあえて我に近づき、我に話しかけ、我の手に触れながら、どこか二人きりの場所に行こうと提案した。彼女は望んだのだ…カエ＝モラグ！そのことを思い出すだけで、我の魂は荒れ狂う！」

languages.original_text: "And still..." {n}Yrliet touches her spirit stone and her face twists with genuine disgust.{/n} "One mon-keigh's stunt has caused the cup of my patience to spill over. She dared to approach me... to speak to me... and, touching my hand, she suggested that we withdraw somewhere private. She wanted... wanted... Kae-morag! The mere memory of it stirs up a tempest in my soul!"

languages.text: "Fakat yine de..." {n}Ruh taşına dokunmasıyla Yrliet'in yüzü, saf bir iğrenmeyle buruşuyor.{/n} "Bir mon-keigh numarası, sabır bardağımı taşırdı. Bana yaklaşmaya... Benimle konuşmaya cüret etti... Elime dokunarak daha sakin bir yere gitmeyi teklif etti. İstediği... İstediği şey... Kae-morag! Hatırlamak bile ruhumda bir fırtınaya sebep oluyor!"
languages.original_text: "And still..." {n}Yrliet touches her spirit stone and her face twists with genuine disgust.{/n} "One mon-keigh's stunt has caused the cup of my patience to spill over. She dared to approach me... to speak to me... and, touching my hand, she... she suggested that we withdraw somewhere private. She wanted... wanted... Kae-morag! The mere memory of it stirs up a tempest in my soul!"

traits.locale_text: "Fakat yine de..." {n}Yrliet, ruh taşına dokunuyor ve yüzü saf bir iğrenmeyle buruşuyor.{/n} "Bir mon-keigh numarası sabır bardağımı taşırdı. Bana yaklaşmaya... Benimle konuşmaya cüret etti... Elime dokunarak daha sakin bir yere gitmeyi teklif etti. İstediği... İstediği şey... Kae-morag! Hatırlamak bile ruhumda bir fırtınaya sebep oluyor!"
